actionId.description: Identifies the action item in the onActionClick on the Menu (Type: any)

className.description: Additional classes added to the action button

icon.description: The action icon to use (React component or element)

isDisabled.description: Disables action, can also be specified on the MenuItem instead

isFavorited.description: Flag indicating if the item is favorited

onClick.description: Callback on action click, can also specify onActionClick on the Menu instead (Function: (event?: any) => void)
